input_doc_description:
Automotive Photographer that focuses on people's investments to bring them 
in more money by having the proper photos to grab the attention of 
potential buyers.

Back





                        About
                      





                        Testimonials
                      




















The Details Matter
























The Sell Your Ride Package
This package consists of simple clean shots of your car used for the purpose of selling online. The market is flooded with online ads with boring phone photos so increase your chances of a sale and stand out from the crowd with some professional shots. Price $550



More Details...





























The Ultimate Package
This package includes a combination of techniques from the Light Painting and Natural Light package. With the extra time of this package we can travel to 2 - 3 different locations/backgrounds. We will also incorporate a mixture of static and action images. Investment  $1200*For shoots in the Boston area - Travel distance may increase price -



More Details...





























The Light Painting Package
A premium shoot of your car or motorcycle. This starting package includes an Initial consultation to determine what kind of shots/theme you prefer and any important features of your car/bike. We will then decide on a location. These photos tend to have dark moody tones with beautiful soft light illuminating your bike on a dark backdrop and will take place at night or dusk. Investment $650



More Details...





























The Natural Light Package
A premium shoot of your car or motorcycle the same as the Light Painting Package but taking place in the early morning or late afternoon with predominantly natural light. The starting package includes an Initial consultation to determine what kind of shots/theme you prefer and any important features of your car/bike as well location.Investment $550



More Details...





























Racetrack Photographic Coverage
For those who want to capture themselves at the race track I am now offering full and half day track coverage of race/practice meets. This includes both road racing, off road and everything in between. Drift, circuit, hill climbs etc.  Up to 8 hrs coverage of the day's proceedings including pit lane shots and track side coverage.  All images will be supplied in high resolution for print and low resolution for web. Perfect for private clubs or events.   Full day coverage starting from $1600



More Details...






















Shoot For DetailsCranston, RI 02921




    Schedule Today
  





































­­
correct_alt_text: A cool professional picture taken at night of 2 classic cars diagonally side by side on a greenery with trees in the background
ai_predicted_contextual_alt_text: Two classic racing cars parked on grass under a starry night sky. On the left, a white car with colorful decals, featuring the Coors logo and a prominent front splitter. On the right, a white Porsche with blue and red stripes, showcasing a rear wing and racing number 61.
ai_predicted_descriptive_alt_text: The image features two vintage race cars parked on a grassy area under a starry night sky. On the left, a BMW with a colorful Coors livery, and on the right, a white Porsche adorned with Brumos Porsche branding and racing stripes.

correct_alt_text: A cool professional picture taken at noon of 3 cars stacking diagonally side by side on a greenery with miniature of each car in the foreground and an big old European suburban cottage in the background
ai_predicted_contextual_alt_text: A lineup of scale model cars, including a white car, a blue car, an orange car, and a red car, displayed in front of a large stone mansion under a partly cloudy sky.
ai_predicted_descriptive_alt_text: A collection of four cars, including a white BMW, a blue BMW M2, an orange sports car, and a red sports car, is displayed in front of a large stone mansion under a partly cloudy sky. In the foreground, there are miniature versions of the same cars, creating a playful scale comparison.
